name: Grilled Salmon with Avocado Salsa (Healthy, Low-Carb, Paleo, Whole30)
description: Tender salmon with cilantro, lime,Â avocado, and tomato salsa. This healthy and flavorful meal is bursting with flavor, color, and texture and is ready in under 20 minutes. It can be grilled, pan-seared or baked!
ingredients: 1/2 cup tomato, diced (any type of tomato)
instructions: Stir the olive oil, garlic, and spices in a small bowl. Brush or rub salmon with the spice mixture. Heat a large heavy-duty (preferably non-stick) pan or grill medium-high heat. Add salmon to the pan and cook for 5-6 minutes per side. Remove from pan, top with avocado salsa and serve immediately. To make the avocado salsa:Add the avocado, tomato, onion, and cilantro to a large mixing bowl. Drizzle with olive oil, fresh lime juice and a pinch of salt and pepper. Gently mix with a spoon until fully combined. Cover with plastic wrap until ready to serve.
